title: Why is the PBE sign up page not working?
body: I don't really recall it ever working, whats up?

replies.body: What link are you using to get to the pbe site?  You may need to log out completely, then log back in through the [euw page](https://pbesignup.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe) directly.  I hope that helps!
